head.title: Record Net Income For Suffolk Bancorp

hedline.hl1: Record Net Income For Suffolk Bancorp

abstract.p: Suffolk Bancorp of Riverhead, NY, reports record 27.1 percent rise in net income in second quarter, to $4 million, and record $7.7 million net income in first half of year (S)

block.p: Suffolk Bancorp of Riverhead (Nasdaq: SUBK) reported record-setting results for the second quarter, when net income rose to $4 million, up 27.1 percent, from $3.2 million a year earlier. Earnings per share rose to 68 cents, from 53 cents.

First-half net income rose to a record $7.7 million, up nearly 24 percent, and earnings per share rose to $1.28, from $1.03. Thomas S. Kohlmann, president and chief executive, attributed the gains to improvements in money management and the vibrant economy.

First-half net income rose to a record $7.7 million, up nearly 24 percent, and earnings per share rose to $1.28, from $1.03. Thomas S. Kohlmann, president and chief executive, attributed the gains to improvements in money management and the vibrant economy.
